testuno: “I’ve been a Stay since 2018 and always got frustrated missing K-pop events because I found out too late. Thanks to StayMap, I found out about the local Stray Kids fanmeeting on time — with tickets still available! This app is my lifesaver.”
testunoby: —Camila, 21 years old, Lima. Stray Kids Fan
testdos: “When Harry came to Peru, I found out way too late. If I had StayMap back then, I wouldn’t have missed it. Now I never let a concert pass me by. I love that the app notifies me before anyone else.”
testdosby: —Andrea, 19 years old, Arequipa. Harry Styles Fan
testtres: “I’ve followed Louis since One Direction and always stay alert for anything he’s involved in. StayMap helped me discover a tribute event in my city and I went with my friends. It was amazing!”
testtresby: —Fernanda, 22 years old, Trujillo. Louis Tomlinson Fan
footerdos: Get concert news, presales, and more, straight to your inbox.
